effect.sword-shield: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.the-crown-tundra: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.legends-arceus: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.

short_effect.sword-shield: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.the-isle-of-armor: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.the-crown-tundra: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.legends-arceus: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stats of the user and its allies for four turns.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stats of the user and its allies for four turns.
